SEARCH
Package Location

Class Location

java.lang.Object
Location.Location
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleField, Enclosure, GallicVillage, GalloRomanVillage, RomanCity, RomanFortifiedCamp
public abstract class Location extends Object
Abstract base class representing a physical location in the simulation. It manages the characters present, available food, environment settings, and the magic potion pot.

    • Location

      public Location(String name, double area, ClanChief clanChief)
      Constructor to initialize a location.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the location.
      area - The surface area of the location.
      clanChief - The chief in charge of this location.

      public boolean hasPotion()
      Checks if a magic potion pot (marmite) is currently available in this location.
      Returns:
      true if a pot is present, false otherwise.

      Returns:
